languages.text: {n}Обведя взглядом гостей и убедившись, что на вас никто не смотрит, дознаватель едва слышно выдыхает.{/n} "Нам нужно поговорить, {name}. Сейчас же".

traits.locale_text: {n}Обведя взглядом гостей и убедившись, что на вас никто не смотрит, дознаватель едва слышно выдыхает.{/n} "Нам нужно поговорить, {name}. Сейчас же".

languages.text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."
languages.original_text: {n}Обведя взглядом гостей и убедившись, что на вас никто не смотрит, дознаватель едва слышно выдыхает.{/n} "Нам нужно поговорить, {name}. Сейчас же".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."
{n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."
{n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."
{n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

languages.text: {n}审讯官看了你一眼，确定没有其他客人注意到你，随后低声开了口。{/n}“我们得谈谈，{name}，马上。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯官看了你一眼，确定没有其他客人注意到你，随后低声开了口。{/n}“我们得谈谈，{name}，马上。”

languages.text: {n}Mirando a los otros invitados para asegurarse de que no os observan, el Interrogador murmura:{/n} «Tenemos que hablar, {name}. Ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mirando a los otros invitados para asegurarse de que no os observan, el Interrogador murmura:{/n} «Tenemos que hablar, {name}. Ahora mismo».

languages.text: {n}他のゲストが気にしているのはあなたではなく、インテロゲイターのつぶやきだと一目で分かる。{/n}「話がある、{name}。それもすぐにだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}他のゲストが気にしているのはあなたではなく、インテロゲイターのつぶやきだと一目で分かる。{/n}「話がある、{name}。それもすぐにだ」

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Blick stellt der Interrogator sicher, dass die übrigen Gäste euch nicht beobachten, und murmelt:{/n} "Wir müssen reden, {name}. Sofort."
languages.original_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Blick stellt der Interrogator sicher, dass die übrigen Gäste euch nicht beobachten, und murmelt:{/n} "Wir müssen reden, {name}. Sofort."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir vérifié d'un rapide coup d'œil que les autres invités ne regardent pas dans votre direction, l'interrogateur vous murmure :{/n} « Nous devons parler, {name}. Maintenant. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir vérifié d'un rapide coup d'œil que les autres invités ne regardent pas dans votre direction, l'interrogateur vous murmure :{/n} « Nous devons parler, {name}. Maintenant. »

languages.text: {n}Diğer misafirlerin sizi izlemediğinden emin olmak için ortalığa göz gezdirdikten sonra Sorgucu, sana bir şeyler mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Konuşmamız lazım {name}. Acil."
languages.original_text: {n}With a glance to make sure the other guests are not observing you, the Interrogator murmurs,{/n} "We need to talk, {name}. Immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Diğer misafirlerin sizi izlemediğinden emin olmak için göz gezdirdikten sonra, Sorgucu sana bir şeyler mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Konuşmamız lazım {name}. Acil."
